author: Anjana George
title: Sidharth Bharathan walks back to life
text:
Giving his first public appearence on thursday after the serious car accident he had on Spetember 12 , actor-director Sidharth Bharathan said; "I think God has blessed me in abundance or else I wouldn't be talking to you right now. All I remember what happened in the past weeks is the accident."
The actor who was admitted in the hospital with a severe head injury and thigh fracture on Spetember 12,midnight. The accident happened at around 2 am in Thaikoodam near Vytilla after his car crashed into a roadside wall, while Sidharth was on his way home. "Sidharth had a skull fracture and was bleeding inside and outside the brain. As a miracle, he responded quickly and became stable in three days. Currently is only having difficulty to walk due the thigh fracture. He will be perfectly alright by another six weeks," said his doctors.
He, who began his career as an actor in Kamal's "Nammal" with Jishnu Raghavan in 2002 turned director in 2012 through "Nidra". His last directorial venture was Dileep-starrer "Chandrettan Evideya".
